section_title: Revision of Prior Knee Arthroplasty (Evidence: pg no: 5, L236)
names: Revision of prior knee arthroplasty (Evidence: pg no: 5, L237)
description: Revision of prior knee arthroplasty for various conditions (Evidence: pg no: 5, L237-L252)
scope: Exchange of some or all components of prior knee replacement (Evidence: pg no: 2, L86-L88)

documentation: ANY of the following conditions: Aseptic loosening, Substantial osteolysis, Progressive soft tissue or bone reaction, Component instability/malalignment/failure/recall, Displaced periprosthetic fracture, Previous removal due to infection, Reconstruction after treatment of infection, or Recurrent disabling pain with specific findings (Evidence: pg no: 5, L239-L252)

codes.description: Revision of total knee arthroplasty, with or without allograft; 1 component (Evidence: pg no: 7, L304)
Revision of total knee arthroplasty, with or without allograft; femoral and entire tibial component (Evidence: pg no: 7, L305)
Removal of prosthesis, including total knee prosthesis, methylmethacrylate with or without insertion of spacer, knee (Evidence: pg no: 7, L306-L307)

notes: Not inclusive of exchange of components for visualization or joint access alone (Evidence: pg no: 2, L87-L88)
